# Create sample transaction data
T = [
    # Order patterns
    1 1 1;  # all items
    1 1 1;  # all items
    0 1 1;  # smartphone + charger
    0 1 1;  # smartphone + charger
    1 0 0;  # just socks
    1 1 0;  # socks + smartphone
    0 1 1;  # smartphone + charger
    1 0 0;  # just socks
    0 1 1;  # smartphone + charger
    1 1 1;  # all items
    0 1 1;  # smartphone + charger
    1 0 0;  # just socks
    0 1 1;  # smartphone + charger
    1 1 0;  # socks + smartphone
    0 1 1;  # smartphone + charger
    1 0 0;  # just socks
    0 1 1;  # smartphone + charger
    1 1 0;  # socks + smartphone
    0 1 1;  # smartphone + charger
    1 1 1   # all items
]

# Calculate and display coappearance matrix
Q = T' * T
println("Transaction matrix T (20x3):")
display(T)
println("\nCoappearance matrix Q (3x3):")
display(Q)
